meanings.definition: To flow out suddenly and plentifully.
meanings.sent1: The water gushes from the fountain.
meanings.sent2: The oil gushes out of the well.
meanings.sent3: The soda gushes out of the can when shaken.
meanings.sent4: Emotions gush out like a burst dam.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall gushes down the rocks with great force.

meanings.definition: To express oneself effusively or with exaggerated enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: She gushes about her favorite book to anyone who will listen.
meanings.sent2: He gushes over his new puppy, calling it the cutest ever.
meanings.sent3: The fan gushes about meeting their favorite celebrity.
meanings.sent4: Compliments gush from her like a never-ending stream.
meanings.sent5: Her excitement gushes out in a constant stream of words and gestures.
